Package com.stehno.ersatz.match

Class CookieMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<Cookie>
      • com.stehno.ersatz.match.CookieMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<Cookie>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
    public class CookieMatcher
extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<Cookie>
    Hamcrest matcher used to match Ersatz request cookie instances.

        public CookieMatcher value​(java.lang.String val)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a reference to the matcher being configured
